entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:48 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
